languages.text: "Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость, но я бы тоже хотела высказаться..." {n}Регина смотрит вам в глаза с нежной полуулыбкой, затем переводит взгляд на супруга.{/n} "Безусловно, я солидарна со своим мужем — губернатор Драйвстем не стал бы выдвигать обвинения, если бы не был уверен в подлинности найденных им доказательств".

traits.locale_text: "Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость, но я бы тоже хотела высказаться..." {n}Регина смотрит вам в глаза с нежной полуулыбкой, затем переводит взгляд на супруга.{/n} "Безусловно, я солидарна со своим благоверным мужем — губернатор Драйвстем не стал бы выдвигать обвинения, если бы не был уверен в подлинности найденных им доказательств".
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I wish to speak too..." {n}Regina looks into your eyes with a tender half-smile, then turns her gaze on her husband.{/n} "Of course, I agree with my husband. Governor Drivestem would not press charges against anyone if he were not absolutely certain of the authenticity of the evidence he had unearthed."
languages.original_text: "Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость, но я бы тоже хотела высказаться..." {n}Регина смотрит вам в глаза с нежной полуулыбкой, затем переводит взгляд на супруга.{/n} "Безусловно, я солидарна со своим мужем — губернатор Драйвстем не стал бы выдвигать обвинения, если бы не был уверен в подлинности найденных им доказательств".

traits.locale_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I would like to speak as well..." {n}Regina looks into your eyes with a tender half-smile, then turns her gaze to her husband.{/n} "Of course, I agree with my husband — Governor Drivestem would not press charges against anyone if he had not been absolutely certain of the authenticity of the evidence he had found."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I would like to speak as well..." {n}Regina looks into your eyes with a tender half-smile, then turns her gaze to her husband.{/n} "Of course, I agree with my husband — Governor Drivestem would not press charges against anyone if he had not been absolutely certain of the authenticity of the evidence he had found."

Governor Drivestem would not press charges against anyone if he were not absolutely certain of the authenticity of the evidence he had unearthed."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I wish to speak too..." {n}Regina looks into your eyes with a tender half-smile, then turns her gaze on her husband.{/n} "Of course, I agree with my husband. Governor Drivestem would not press charges against anyone if he were not absolutely certain of the authenticity of the evidence he had unearthed."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: 「失礼ですが、陛下、私もお話ししたいことが…」{n}レジーナがかすかに柔和な笑みを浮かべてあなたの目をのぞき込むと、視線を夫に移す。{/n}「もちろん、私も夫と同意見です。ドライブステン総督は、発見した証拠の信憑性に100パーセントの確信が持てない限り、人を告発する方ではありません」
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I wish to speak too..." {n}Regina looks into your eyes with a tender half-smile, then turns her gaze on her husband.{/n} "Of course, I agree with my husband. Governor Drivestem would not press charges against anyone if he were not absolutely certain of the authenticity of the evidence he had unearthed."

traits.locale_text: 「失礼ですが、陛下、私もお話ししたいことが…」{n}レジーナがかすかに柔和な笑みを浮かべてあなたの目をのぞき込むと、視線を夫に移す。{/n}「もちろん、私も夫と同意見です。ドライブステン総督は、発見した証拠の信憑性に100パーセントの確信が持てない限り、人を告発する方ではありません」
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: “请恕我多嘴，大人……”{n}蕾吉娜对你温柔一笑，随后将目光转到一旁的丈夫身上。{/n}“我也同意我先生的看法。如果没有确凿的证据，德莱夫斯塔总督不会轻率地提出这种指控。”
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I wish to speak too..." {n}Regina looks into your eyes with a tender half-smile, then turns her gaze on her husband.{/n} "Of course, I agree with my husband. Governor Drivestem would not press charges against anyone if he were not absolutely certain of the authenticity of the evidence he had unearthed."

traits.locale_text: “请恕我多嘴，大人……”{n}蕾吉娜对你温柔一笑，随后将目光转到一旁的丈夫身上。{/n}“我也同意我先生的看法。如果没有确凿的证据，德莱夫斯塔总督不会轻率地提出这种指控。”
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: « Excusez-moi, Votre Seigneurie, mais j'ai moi aussi à parler... »{n}Régina vous regarde droit dans les yeux en esquissant un tendre sourire avant de se tourner vers son mari.{/n} « Je suis bien évidemment d'accord avec mon mari. Le gouverneur Drivestem ne porterait jamais de telles accusations s'il n'était pas absolument certain de l'authenticité des preuves en sa possession. »
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I wish to speak too..." {n}Regina looks into your eyes with a tender half-smile, then turns her gaze on her husband.{/n} "Of course, I agree with my husband. Governor Drivestem would not press charges against anyone if he were not absolutely certain of the authenticity of the evidence he had unearthed."

traits.locale_text: « Excusez-moi, Votre Seigneurie, mais j'ai moi aussi à parler... »{n}Régina vous regarde droit dans les yeux en esquissant un tendre sourire avant de se tourner vers son mari.{/n} « Je suis bien évidemment d'accord avec mon mari. Le gouverneur Drivestem ne porterait jamais de telles accusations s'il n'était pas absolument certain de l'authenticité des preuves en sa possession. »
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: «Lo siento, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero a mí también me gustaría decir algo...». {n}Regina te mira mientras sonríe tiernamente y vuelve la mirada hacia su marido.{/n} «No cabe duda en que estoy de acuerdo con mi marido. El gobernador Drivestem no presentaría cargos contra nadie de no estar completamente seguro de la autenticidad de las pruebas».
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I wish to speak too..." {n}Regina looks into your eyes with a tender half-smile, then turns her gaze on her husband.{/n} "Of course, I agree with my husband. Governor Drivestem would not press charges against anyone if he were not absolutely certain of the authenticity of the evidence he had unearthed."

traits.locale_text: «Lo siento, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero a mí también me gustaría decir algo...». {n}Regina te mira mientras sonríe tiernamente y vuelve la mirada hacia su marido.{/n} «No cabe duda en que estoy de acuerdo con mi marido. El gobernador Drivestem no presentaría cargos contra nadie de no estar completamente seguro de la autenticidad de las pruebas».
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: "Verzeiht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, doch auch ich möchte etwas sagen ..." {n}Regina blickt dir mit einem zarten Lächeln in die Augen und sieht dann wieder zu ihrem Gemahl.{/n} "Ich bin natürlich ganz der Meinung meines Ehemanns. Gouverneur Drivestem würde keine Anschuldigungen gegen jemanden vorbringen, wäre er sich nicht absolut gewiss, dass die von ihm gefundenen Beweise stichhaltig und echt sind."
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I wish to speak too..." {n}Regina looks into your eyes with a tender half-smile, then turns her gaze on her husband.{/n} "Of course, I agree with my husband. Governor Drivestem would not press charges against anyone if he were not absolutely certain of the authenticity of the evidence he had unearthed."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, doch auch ich möchte etwas sagen ..." {n}Regina blickt dir mit einem zarten Lächeln in die Augen und sieht dann wieder zu ihrem Gemahl.{/n} "Ich bin natürlich ganz der Meinung meines Ehemanns. Gouverneur Drivestem würde keine Anschuldigungen gegen jemanden vorbringen, wäre er sich nicht absolut gewiss, dass die von ihm gefundenen Beweise stichhaltig und echt sind."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, müsaade ederseniz ben de fikrimi belirtmek isterim..." {n}Regina, narin bir tebessümle gözlerinin içine baktıktan sonra bakışlarını kocasına çeviriyor.{/n} "Tabii ki kocamla hemfikirim. Vali Drivestem, elde ettiği delillere güvenmese kimseyi bu şekilde itham etmezdi."
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I wish to speak too..." {n}Regina looks into your eyes with a tender half-smile, then turns her gaze on her husband.{/n} "Of course, I agree with my husband. Governor Drivestem would not press charges against anyone if he were not absolutely certain of the authenticity of the evidence he had unearthed."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, müsaade ederseniz ben de fikrimi belirtmek isterim..." {n}Regina, narin bir tebessümle gözlerinin içine baktıktan sonra bakışlarını kocasına çeviriyor.{/n} "Tabii ki kocamla hemfikirim. Vali Drivestem elde ettiği delillere güvenmese kimseyi bu şekilde itham etmezdi."
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback
